desc: 测试查询员工表方法调用的案例, NOW, LTRIM, RTRIM, TRIM, CONCAT, SUBSTRING, LENGTH, YEAR, MONTH, DAY
name: SelectStaffSelfMethod

oqls.name: SelectStaffSelfTextMethods
oqls.oql: select LTRIM(staffName), RTRIM(staffName), TRIM(staffName), SUBSTRING(staffName, 1, 2) as subStaff, CONCAT(staffName, '/', staffCode) as staff, LENGTH(staffName), NVL(departDate, '2010-20-20') as departDate from Staff where staffName = '张三'
oqls.sql: select LTRIM(STA_NAME), RTRIM(STA_NAME), TRIM(STA_NAME), CONCAT(STA_NAME, '/', STA_CODE), LENGTH(STA_NAME) from STAFF where STA_NAME = '张三'

oqls.name: SelectStaffSelfDateMethods
oqls.oql: select NOW() as now, YEAR(joinDate), MONTH(joinDate), DAY(joinDate) as day, DATE(joinDate) as date, TIMESTAMP(joinDate) as ts, DATE_FORMAT(joinDate, '%Y-%m-%d') as df from Staff where staffName = '张三'
oqls.sql: select NOW(), YEAR(JOIN_DATE), MONTH(JOIN_DATE), DAY(JOIN_DATE) from STAFF, DATE(JOIN_DATE), TIMESTAMP(JOIN_DAE), DATE_FORMAT(JOIN_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') fro STAFF where STA_NAME = '张三'
